import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Navbar, Nav, Image, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { logout } from "../Actions/auth"; function MainNav(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { isLoggedIn, user } = useSelector(state => state.auth); const logOut = () => { dispatch(logout()); }; return (

); } export default MainNav;
